channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud slipping into road, 2nd March
item.description:
There is a large amount of mud falling into the road again which is hazardous to drivers and those coming in the other direction as people are going into the middle of the road to avoid it
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A435, Cowley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Looks like it is abandoned, 2nd March
item.description:
This car appeared a couple of weeks ago and doesn’t appear to have moved since . I haven’t noticed anyone going to it either .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 90 Golden Vale, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Green light out, 2nd March
item.description:
The green light on the traffic lights facing the traffic exiting Telstar Way onto the A40 (the lights which are on the traffic island in the middle of the A40) is not functioning
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Telstar Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden bed parts dumped on grass verge opposite YMCA building, 2nd March
item.description:
The bed was dumped there about 10 days ago. We are longer drive otherwise we'd have disposed of it ourselves.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Vittoria Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose manhole cover keeping residents awake on Shakespeare Road, 2nd March
item.description:
This cover has been hammering for weeks and nobody has come to fix it. I suspect it belongs to Southwest water please come and check

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 91 Shakespeare Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two potholes on junction, 2nd March
item.description:
One after the other.

item.title: Heavily worn pavements, 1st March
item.description:
Pavements across the Marsh area crumbling with loose stones causing a significant trip hazard and some nasty grazes. Needs to be reviewed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Marsh Gardens, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree branch at rear of 1 Tudor Lodge., 1st March
item.description:
Tree branch came down in the recent storms and needs removing for safety and tidiness

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Tudor Lodge, 17 The Park, Cheltenham

item.title: Storm drains blocked, 1st March
item.description:
The storm drains on the Cirencester Road from Hartley Road down towards the golf course are blocked with mud etc. The path is also strewn with debris, stones and mud.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Shepherds Fold Cirencester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti back on shelter 1/3/22, 1st March
item.description:
It’s back. Also other graffiti mentioned on top of other bus stop not cleared yet.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1-2a Crescent Terrace, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Amber is only displayed for 2 seconds, 28th February
item.description:
The Amber traffic light only displays for 2 seconds which is much too quick for this 60mph road travelling on the A40 in direction from Northleach to Cheltenham. This causes heavy braking. Regulations state that Amber should be displayed for 3 seconds. This needs fixing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars parking on zigzags outside school., 28th February
item.description:
This is todays example of inconsiderate parking outside Swindon Village Primary School. This was at after school club pick up time. Normal pickup time is bad too.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Church Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken sign, 28th February
item.description:
As pictures show sign has rotted at base and wind has bent across footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Morningside Close, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 27th February
item.description:
I believe a vehicle, a Renault master van reg number NX57EAJ, has been abandoned. It is untaxed and un-insured, has a cracked windscreen and has not been moved for many months. It is currently in a carpark in Wilson drive and is causing parking problems due to lack of parking spaces at times in the area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Wilson Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
